title: To Paint a Water Lily - nature and artist's task

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hughes uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitudes toward nature and the artist’s task.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Hughes uses literary elements and techniques to convey the speaker’s complex attitudes toward nature and the artist’s task.

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
